snippet: The recruitment of the longtime Democratic strategist John D. Podesta comes as the president is seeking to recover public support after the flawed rollout of the new health insurance marketplaces.
abstract: Longtime Democratic strategist John D Podesta will join the Obama administration as a counselor; moves comes as Pres Obama seeks to recover public support after the flawed rollout of health insurance marketplaces.
lead_paragraph: The recruitment of the longtime Democratic strategist John D. Podesta comes as the president is seeking to recover public support after the flawed rollout of the new health insurance marketplaces.

headline.main: Ex-Clinton Aide Expected to Join Obama
headline.print_headline: Ex-Clinton Aide Expected to Join Obama
